Title: MuPDF: User-assisted execution of arbitrary code
Synopsis:
Multiple vulnerabilities have been found in MuPDF, possibly
    resulting in remote code execution or Denial of Service.

Background.Text: MuPDF is a lightweight PDF viewer and toolkit written in portable C.

Description.Text: Multiple vulnerabilities have been discovered in MuPDF. Please review the CVE identifier and Secunia Research referenced below for details.

Impact.Text: A remote attacker could entice a user to open a specially crafted PDF using MuPDF, possibly resulting in execution of arbitrary code with the privileges of the process or a Denial of Service condition.

Workaround.Text: There is no known workaround at this time.

P.Text: All MuPDF users should upgrade to the latest version:

URI.Text:
Secunia Research:
      MuPDF Two Integer Overflow Vulnerabilities
